newsitem.title: USA: System Software Q3 July 31 revs rise.
newsitem.headline: System Software Q3 July 31 revs rise.

text.p: System Software Associates Inc said Monday revenues for its fiscal third quarter ended July 31, 1997, were a record $114.7 million, up 58.6 percent from $72.3 million a year ago.
Software license revenues were $83.2 million, an increase of 84.1 percent from $45.2 million recorded a year ago.
Client services revenues grew 16.2 percent to $31.5 million in the quarter, compared to $27.1 million a year ago.

"The company ended its fiscal third quarter with cash balances in excess of $31 million due to experiencing positive cash flow of more than $11 million," Joseph Skadra, vice president and chief financial officer said.
The company said it expects to release full third quarter results next week.
System Software shares rose 7/16 to 9-3/8 Monday.
